target_text: "Yes, very important question! Software quality is first and most the product confirms to the requirements and free of defects."

Role_Team.positionality: As a Product Owner with a background in Sociology, I approach innovation through a lens of human-centered design, prioritizing inclusivity and systemic impact. My core value of innovation drives me to challenge norms and create solutions that empower diverse communities.

As a Scrum Master with a background in ethics, I prioritize accuracy in agile practices to ensure transparency, fairness, and trust within teams. My ethical grounding drives me to uphold integrity in processes, balancing efficiency with thoughtful decision-making.

As someone with a business and management background, I approach quality assurance with a focus on efficiency and continuous improvement, and my core value of innovation drives me to seek creative solutions that enhance both product quality and process effectiveness.

codebook.justification: [the product confirms to the requirements] highlights adherence to specifications, a core quality goal in software development.
[free of defects] emphasizes reliability, a key attribute of high-quality software.

All three roles (Product Owner, Scrum Master, QA) emphasize '[free of defects]' as a key attribute of high-quality software, focusing on reliability.
